data.text: @LiloAuntie @Sandraxf Assume, hope and pray it is not castle 2.0 without "our" Beckett. 😥
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf This isn't about trying to convince you. I'm just making these points for people who follow me. ☺
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf Lol! So, you never watched Law and Order and SVU? Similar premises, same creator, very  different shows.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf MilMar did a excellent job w/ the genre when they did Castle. Imo that merits giving Take Two a shot. It won't be Castle, but could be good.

@Beckstle @Sandraxf I don't have to convince you. you talk about different shows, not written by the seme authors. "Watch what you love". I'm not interested a millmar copy show. You can watch and love the show, i don't care.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf All of those shows were good, (though I Ioved some more than others) Yet, despite the basic premises being the same, they were all unique.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf B. Your argument means Castle's a "cheap copy" of Moonlighting, or Bones, or the Mentalist.... Let's not pretend Castle was the 1st.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf A. It's not a police detective. He's a private eye, which means no government help.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf Going by your logic every show is just a copy of Remington Steele & not worth watching. In truth, what matters is the story's execution.
@Beckstle @Sandraxf here we have same writers who write a show where we have a police detective and a VIP investigate together. IMHO Is not basic similarity, is quite the same. A cheap copy.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf Every "will they/won't they show" has a basic similarity. The entire genre is based on opposites attract.  Remington Steele, Moonlighting...

@Beckstle @Sandraxf a famous VIP (remember Castle's pilot?) having trouble with work, follows a police detective. Quite similar, do not you think? Obviously it couldn't be all the same, but it's the same situation. It looks like an AU FF
@LiloAuntie @Sandraxf In particular, he used his knowledge of old movies to figure out cases and solutions. "Sam" uses knowledge from her TV show scripts. :)
@Sandraxf Castle part 2?!?! All I can see is Stana, all there will be is Stana!❤️❤️😰🌹
@Laura_Bollin @Rhiannon_K_82 @Sandraxf Season 7 announcement was for Derrick Storm tv series. Take Two came about cos they saw what was happening to their creation.
@Rhiannon_K_82 That's Twitter in all its beauty...and madness...
@Sandraxf I can’t wait for that show!!😍
@LiloAuntie @Sandraxf Frankly, when you read the premise it's more of a Remington Steele flip than a Castle flip. It sounds fun. ☺ https://t.co/5OMRFoc1h2
@LiloAuntie @Sandraxf Well...Beckett started w/ short hair. This is like KB season 4-5 hair 😉. What's interesting is Rachel doesn't sound like Beckett or Castle.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf It's actually not the same story. Rachel's character isn't like Beckett or Castle. Castle wasn't a recovering addict nor publicly humiliated
@Sandraxf For a moment there, i thought she was Beckett's double !
@Rhiannon_K_82 @JCxAlways @StanaEqualsBae @Sandraxf Hope so
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf My thoughts exactly
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf Me too! But since it's them I am definItely watching❤ hey I was hungry for more detective-consultant shows, I even started watching Instinct.
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf Yeah it was a great dynamic and the chemistry Yvonne and Zac brought was unmatched at times ,
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf It’s still my fave show ever ,  so much fun with a great cast and a unique idea which made it loveable , plus who doesn’t  love a nerd 🤙🏻
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf A know 😂I did rewatch it a few months ago tho #Chuck
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf Lou the deli girl with the mouth of a trucker 😂. Yeah #Charah all the way
@Sandraxf The show doesn’t have NF... that’s a big bonus guys!!! So it’s a maybe for me 😃👍
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf Yeah me too , loved her in the OC and the eps of chuck she was in ,
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf Love Rachel so I’ll be tuning in
@JCxAlways @Sandraxf We all do! https://t.co/QC1AuDQMq0

@Rhiannon_K_82 @Sandraxf This isn’t the first show out there to use a premise similar to a previous show. If I like the show I’ll watch. If I don’t then I won’t. It’s that simple. I love Milmar so I’ll definitely give it a chance before I pass judgement on anything, including the premise.
@Sandraxf Will watch because it’s #MilMar.
@nikita82roma @Sandraxf MilMar! YES!
@Ladodue @Sandraxf That's ok and he's a hotter looking guy 🤭

@Ladodue @Sandraxf Castle 2.0? No Thank you 
#CaskettAlways
@Sandraxf It looks like a cheap imitation of Castle. Same story, reversed situation. Rachel Bilson however isn’t Stana, and Cibrian has nothing to do with Nathan. Big No.
@Sandraxf Wow! Those poses look really familiar.

@Sandraxf I’ll watch.Don’t know either actor but I didn’t know Katic, Fillion or Marlowe’s prior work until #Castle.The chemistry& acting skills were what made me a fan. Since I was late in coming to #Castle,did it receive as much advanced publicity?It certainly didn’t get much later on.
@Sandraxf First thing I saw: Beckett's hair
@Sandraxf im sorry but this is reverse Castle!!
@Sandraxf Wishing them luck, !!
@Sandraxf it s smell #castle 2.0 #isaythatisaynothing
